snippet.title: 🃏Dice Assassin | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#afilgames #diceassassin

🃏 Dice Assassin Launch Trailer 🃏
🐀 Available for Steam, Xbox, and Microsoft Store!

Dice Assassin is a challenging game where you defeat enemies on the board according to the dice numbers. Choose attacks using cards, position yourself strategically to overcome enemies on the board, and devise tactics using action cards.

Game Features:
♦️ Roll of the dice and strategy together.
♣️ Collect skill cards that provide special effects
♠️ Tactical movement on a classic board game

❤ Are you ready to accept the challenge and become a true assassin? ❤

Get yours! 👇👇👇
🐀 Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/dice-assassin/9nf4gxscj5w2
🐀 Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9nrxxths5m6x
🐀 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2573470/Dice_Assassin/
🐀 Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009217

🎮 Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AfilGames
🕹️ Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AfilGames
⚔️ Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/afilgames/
👊 Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@afilgames
